Privacy Policy for Estate Market Vendor App

Effective Date: 25/04/2025

The Estate Market Vendor App is intended for business vendors to manage orders, earnings, and product listings. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect vendor data.

Information We Collect

  • Business registration details
  • Vendor contact info (email, phone)
  • Store location
  • Sales and transaction data

Usage

  • Order and inventory management
  • Payment tracking and account management
  • App performance and customer support

We do not sell or share your data. Contact: support@myestatemarket.shop
